1: -module (matchmaker_SUITE).
    2: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    3: -include("../src/matchmaker_records.hrl").
    4: -export([init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2, all/0]).
    5: 
    6: -export([enter_queue/1,enter_queue_as_record/1,get_players_in_queue/1,find_match_three_v_three/1]).
    7: 
    8: all() -> [enter_queue,enter_queue_as_record,get_players_in_queue,find_match_three_v_three].
    9: 
   10: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   11:     Priv = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
   12:     application:set_env(mnesia, dir, Priv),
   13:     matchmaker:install([node()]),
   14:     application:start(mnesia),
   15:     application:start(matchmaker),
   16:     Config.
   17: 
   18: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   19:     application:stop(mnesia),
   20:     ok.
   21: 
   22: init_per_testcase(enter_queue, Config) ->
   23:     ok = matchmaker:enter_queue("A", 1, 10, 1230),
   24:     ok = matchmaker:enter_queue("B", 2, 1, 1530),
   25:     ok = matchmaker:enter_queue("C", 5, 3, 1630),
   26:     ok = matchmaker:enter_queue("D", 1, 3, 1430),
   27:     ok = matchmaker:enter_queue("E", 30, 5, 1730),
   28:     ok = matchmaker:enter_queue("F", 7, 2, 1590),
   29:     ok = matchmaker:enter_queue("G", 3, 10, 1330),
   30:     ok = matchmaker:enter_queue("H", 10, 3, 1630),
   31:     ok = matchmaker:enter_queue("I", 10, 7, 1530),
   32:     ok = matchmaker:enter_queue("J", 1, 3, 1450),
   33:     ok = matchmaker:enter_queue("K", 5, 3, 1610),
   34:     Config;
   35: init_per_testcase(enter_queue_as_record, Config) ->
   36:     Config;
   37: init_per_testcase(get_players_in_queue, Config) ->
   38:     Config;
   39: init_per_testcase(find_match_three_v_three, Config) ->
   40:     Config;
   41: init_per_testcase(find_match_five_v_five, Config) ->
   42:     Config.
   43: 
   44: end_per_testcase(_, _Config) ->
   45:     ok.
   46: 
   47: enter_queue(_Config) ->
   48:     ok = matchmaker:enter_queue("Gram", 50, 3, 1630),
   49:     {"Gram", _Win, _Losses, _Mmr} = matchmaker:player_by_name("Gram"),
   50:     undefined = matchmaker:player_by_name(make_ref()).
   51: 
   52: enter_queue_as_record(_Config) ->
   53:     ok = matchmaker:enter_queue(#player{name="Gram Player",wins=50,losses=3,mmr=1630}),
   54:     {"Gram Player", 50, 3, 1630} = matchmaker:player_by_name("Gram Player"),
   55:     undefined = matchmaker:player_by_name(make_ref()).
   56: 
   57: get_players_in_queue(_Config) ->
   58:     {atomic,[1500,1500,1500,1500,1530,1520,1500]} = matchmaker:lookup_players_in_queue(),
   59:     failed = matchmaker:lookup_players_in_queue().
   60: 
   61: find_match_three_v_three(_Config) ->
   62:     match_found = matchmaker:find_match(3),
   63:     undefined = matchmaker:find_match(make_ref()).
   64: 
   65: % find_match_five_v_five(_Config) ->
   66: %     match_found = matchmaker:find_match(5),
   67: %     undefined = matchmaker:find_match(make_ref()).
